thread.title: Freestyle Creative Promotes Alexis Trammell to Director of Account Services

author: cnbc.com
title: Freestyle Creative Promotes Alexis Trammell to Director of Account Services
text:
OKLAHOMA CITY, Feb. 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Freestyle Creative announces today that Alexis Trammell has been promoted to director of account services.
In Trammell's new role, she will lead the account services and digital marketing departments and oversee the strategy for all Freestyle clients, including each clients' branding, digital marketing, website development, video production and public relations initiatives.
"Alexis has contributed significantly to Freestyle's success," said Kelley Gann, president of Freestyle Creative. "She has been an instrumental part of Freestyle since the agency's first steps as a full-service marketing agency. Through the years, she's consistently stepped up in major ways for this company and thinks strategically to pursue the highest caliber results for our clients."
Trammell is a graduate of the University of Oklahoma with a bachelor's degree in journalism and an emphasis in public relations. She began her career at Freestyle as a part-time digital marketing strategist and was promoted to an account lead position within five months. Within the past year, Trammell was promoted and has been serving as an account executive and manager of the digital marketing department.
As an account executive, Trammell managed clients' creative projects, budgets, deadlines and relationships. She has served more than 30 of Freestyle's clients in various industries including nonprofit, tourism, business-to-business, education, health care, retail, real estate and entertainment.
For more information about Trammell or Freestyle Creative's services, visit FreestyleOKC.com .
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/freestyle-creative-promotes-alexis-trammell-to-director-of-account-services-300592115.html
SOURCE Freestyle Creative
